Description:
Price Reduced to $780,000
Should we sell or keep it? Your last opportunity to stake a claim to this stunning inner city residence providing versatile accommodation
over three levels, punctuated by magnificent city sky line views.
The value packed floor plan gives you two spacious light-filled living areas (with two terraces on the upper level), three bedrooms (main with ensuite and walk in robe) and two car auto garage. Professionals seeking a home office please note!
Further features include stone finishes, European appliances, alarm system, video intercom, panel heating, air-conditioning and hardwood floors. Close to Yarra Bend parkland, trails, train station and cafes.
Priced to sell, call for an appointment or inspect this weekend!
Leonard Siragusa : 0407 875 048

Description:
Inner-City Allure!
A more attractive slate roof facade you're unlikely to find than that of this superb Hawthorn brick terrace tucked quietly and conveniently away in a charming city-fringe pocket at the doorstep of vibrant Brunswick/Smith Streets, Queens Parade, and Darling/Edinburgh Gardens. Instantly inviting interior spaces renovated for the utmost comfort convey beautiful period character that leads to a large, secluded and sun-filled courtyard garden - simply perfect for relaxed alfresco entertaining! An arched hallway flows to three generous bedrooms (two BIRs), elegant living room and renovated chef's kitchen with Miele/Bosch appliances, ready to cook up a storm! Also offers beautiful Italian tiled bathroom with luxurious deep soaker bath, separate toilet/powder room, European laundry, split-system heating/cooling, classical ceilings, ornamental fireplace, paved light court, good storage, security doors and rear ROW. Stroll to nearby city trams and Clifton Hill train station.
Stefan Dzanovski : 0404 828 723

Description:
Tempting Inner City Tri-Level Warehouse
A sought after inner city locale showcases this impressive, tri-level, designer residence with city views and zoned living.
Stylishly finished it delivers a versatile floor plan and a fabulous low maintenance lifestyle.
Well equipped kitchen overlooks the open plan meals and living area. The tranquil first floor comprises two bright bedrooms, the master with WIR and access to the luxury main bathroom with relaxing corner spa. The top level presents an extensive family room with balcony access, third bedroom with city views and a pristine bathroom, perfect for a parents/teenage retreat. Extras include a third toilet, covered parking, intercom entry, slab heating, great storage and rev/cycle heating/cooling. Close to freeway access, transport, Darling Gardens and Yarra Bend Park.
Photo ID Required
Greg Cusack : 0417 128 125

Description:
THE ONE YOU’VE BEEN WAITING FOR!
Fully renovated with a flexible floor plan, native garden and a dual street frontage, this 5 bedroom family home is in a class of its own. Located close to parkland, Clifton Hill Village and Spensley Street Primary School, the extensive accommodation will suit the most discerning family home buyer. From a central hallway with pressed metal ceilings open a large fitted study/bedroom facing the garden and the sunny main bedroom; in the centre of the house are a music room with recessed ceiling and a gracious formal sitting room. The hall opens out into a light-flooded informal living and dining area, overlooked by a well equipped kitchen, and flowing out through a wall of glass to the Matthew Dux-designed back garden, featuring a ‘creek’ and a timber walkway. The rear section also contains a tiled bathroom (separate bath and shower), a WC and a big sunny laundry/crafts room. Upstairs, three further airy bedrooms and a second bathroom open from another living/study area with views to Studley Park. A large fully-lined garage opens from Little Walker Street. This exceptional property must be seen to be appreciated – its many features include open fireplaces, ducted heating, reverse-cycle air conditioning, alarm system and generous storage space to both levels.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
A relaxing inner-city lifestyle awaits
Warehouse 1
Stylish 3-level home featuring spectacular light-filled interior spaces. Stunning residence that perfectly balances its warehouse origins
-Vaulted ceilings, timber floors and soaring windows - quality finishes and savvy, contemporary design
-Via its charming private entrance, a cleverly zoned layout offers 3 beautiful bedrooms (two with WIR)
-Expansive open-plan living and dining areas with a north-facing entertainer's balcony
-Beautifully appointed kitchen
-2 stylish bathrooms (bath & ensuite to main)
-Secure undercover parking for 2 cars; separate laundry
-Hydronic heating and reverse cycle split system air conditioning
Positioned in a coveted city-fringe pocket, this truly unique home oozes style and warmth on the doorstep of Clifton Village.
Chris O'Shaughnessy 0418 536 262
Michael Kurts 0418 319 811

Description:
Release Your Inner Renovator
Someday soon, such pure potential will no longer be discovered so close to the city. This Victorian's terrace facade conceals interior spaces that are ready to renovate - today. As an additional incentive to update and enhance today's two bedroom spaces, a generous north easterly back garden and laneway suggest options for further extending and introducing rear right-of-way (STCA). A period streetscape, proximity to Clifton Hill station, Darling Gardens, local cafes and bike paths by the Yarra inspires ideas for adding contemporary character to classical soul beneath original high ceilings. The time has (finally) arrived
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS
PLEASE NOTE: Open for Inspection Times and Property Availability is subject to change or cancellation without notice. Melway Ref 2CK4

Description:
VILLAGE LIFESTYLE WITH CITY-EDGE CONVENIENCE!
Complete with dual-street frontage, this commanding Victorian terrace (tucked away on a service road) offers a fantastic living environment in vibrant Clifton Hill Village. On a delightfully deep block of land, the home's spacious interior features two enormous bedrooms and updated bathroom, central lounge room and dining (potential third bedroom), timber kitchen with Bosch dishwasher and light-filled meals/living area. Other highlights include gas heating and split-system a/c, open fireplaces, separate laundry, Baltic pine floorboards and high ornate ceilings throughout, plus a sizable brick-paved courtyard with off-street parking option via rollerdoor out to Rose Street. Enjoyable now with scope to further enhance, in a fabulous location close to Clifton Hill Station, parks and trails, Queens Parade shops, cafés and trams.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
WIDER THAN MOST
With its particularly appealing facade, this wide Victorian home offers a flexible and unique floor plan situated on a battle axe allotment. Featuring polished boards and period details throughout, it comprises 2 bedrooms (the main being very large), light-filled open plan living, bathroom with concealed laundry, and an attractive, fully-decked rear with pedestrian right of way access at the rear. Situated on the high of the hill, its popularity is assured. See it!

Description:
Where Life's An Adventure!
An award-winning sustainably designed extension from innovative Ande Bunbury Architects broadens the lifestyle horizons of this extra-wide freestanding Victorian on a one-way street metres to hectares of Yarra parkland. 'Pensilva' c1880 merges impressive classical spaces and striking contemporary design creating a wonderful energy-efficient domain of warmth, depth and family functionality that flows to a rustic inner-city garden with elevated decking, sunshine, seclusion and off-street parking. With a strong emphasis on sustainability and the environment, this unique residence offers ornate arched hall, three large bedrooms (amazing upstairs parents retreat including study, walk-in-robe and ensuite), living room (fireplace), lounge/dining with day bed, huge stone kitchen with Ilve stove, central bathroom (clawfoot bath), clever storage, ducted heating, air-conditioning and alarm. Close to cafes, trains and shops.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
Surprising Space Near Parkland
Rising above the rest with an elevated position, north-facing rear and second-level addition, this delightful freestanding Edwardian is nestled in a popular period row where Yarra River parkland, city bike trails, Clifton Hill cafes, inner city shopping and train station are all easily accessed. A classical facade provides an irresistible invitation to the tastefully renovated interior where natural light and heritage detailing fill especially relaxing spaces offering the utmost comfort and privacy. A bright hallway framed by polished floorboards and high ceilings leads to two double bedrooms with built-in robes and open fireplaces, an upstairs third bedroom or study, central bathroom, laundry area, big and hearty kitchen/meals with stainless-steel appliances, sunny living room (open fireplace) overlooking attractive courtyard garden with ROW. Also offers ducted heating, air-conditioning, substantial storage and sustainability features including solar systems and plumbed water tank.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128

Description:
Wonderful Location... Delightful Renovation...
Within one of Clifton Hill’s favourite streets enjoying acres of Yarra River parkland and quality playing fields literally at the end of the street is this delightfully renovated 2 bedroom apartment featuring security intercom entry and off street car parking. Part of a well maintained complex of only 12 the apartment is located at the rear of the block on the second floor and is blessed by a sunny demeanour enjoying a lovely northern orientation.
Currently leased to excellent tenants until January 2012 (returning $ 360.00 per week) the apartment would make an ideal ongoing investment or alternatively a fantastic first purchase sure to not only enhance your life but your future wealth with a strong history of capital growth and pro-active owner’s corporation. Tastefully renovated the apartment features 2 spacious bedrooms with robes, huge light filled living room, gorgeous kitchen with dishwasher, cute & functional bathroom with laundry facilities, floating timber floor and quality fittings & fixtures throughout.
Insights: 8/4 Wright Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2011 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

PRIZED CAR ACCESS
Situated on the high of the hill, only a stone's throw from parklands, city train, shops and schools, this enviably located handsome Edwardian home features: original period details (OFPs, ceiling roses, deep cornices and beautiful polished floorboards), side entrance allowing for a return hallway, 2 very generous bedrooms, inviting lounge with gas open fire, central bathroom, separate laundry, light-filled dining/living zone incorporating kitchen with stainless steel appliances, paved rear courtyard garden, and off street parking via the right of way. See it.

Description:
ELEGANT EDWARDIAN, PRIME VILLAGE POSITION
This extremely spacious and superbly renovated residence is close to Clifton Hill station and shops, Queens Parade cafes, schools and Yarra Parkland. On a wide corner block the house opens from a tessellated verandah into a wide fretwork-trimmed hallway, floored in gleaming recycled jarrah. To one side open two exceptionally large bedrooms, both with open fireplaces, deep cornices and quality built-in wardrobes; the second bedroom has a door to a side lightway. A smaller third bedroom (BIRs) also runs from the hall, which opens out into a gracious formal dining room featuring an Art Nouveau style fire surround. To the rear of the house, a high-ceilinged extension houses the living room, overlooked by a well-designed kitchen fitted with premium appliances, granite benchtops and ample storage. The expansive living zone flows out through multifold doors to a paved and landscaped north-facing entertaining area. To one side are a smart fully-tiled bathroom and a concealed laundry.
Finished to an exemplary standard, this light-filled property includes ducted heating, reverse-cycle airconditioning and alarm system. Contemporary architectural detail blends superbly with an array of appealing period detail. In this sought-after precinct, here is Village living at its best!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Light & Bright!
This wonderfully light and appealing top floor strata apartment is set in a prized residential precinct with the historic Darling Gardens directly opposite. Trains, trams, the Collingwood Leisure Centre and vibrant Queens Parade shopping area are all just minutes away. Thoroughly maintained accommodation comprises entry hall, living room drawing northerly light and adjacent separate kitchen, bedroom with city views (built-in-robe and study desk) and bathroom plus off-street parking on title. Both investors and first home buyers seeking affordable entry to the rapidly appreciating Clifton Hill market will want to inspect.

Description:
Secluded & Stylish Size Surprise
Expect an unexpectedly high level of style, quality, space and quiet with this sensational contemporary townhouse that is brilliantly positioned for the inner-urban lifestyle lover or savvy investor to enjoy it all at their doorstep. Extending up to a large retreat featuring ensuite, walk-in-robe and balcony with views; this outstanding three bedroom residence is superbly appointed and perfectly private featuring remote control garage plus wonderful courtyard garden for secluded alfresco entertaining. Boasts stunning living/dining area on polished parquetry floor, Blanco-equipped stone kitchen, bathroom (frameless glass shower), laundry, powder room, heating/cooling, security shutters, second balcony and intercom. Near cafes, shops, Darling Gardens and trains.

Description:
SPACIOUS, STYLISH AND BRIGHT
This tastefully renovated ground floor apartment set to the rear of a well-maintained block has so much to offer. Entry is to a wide central passage, opening through double doors on one side to a spacious living room with broad east-facing windows. On the other side are the well-fitted kitchen/meals area and a large bathroom/laundry with separate WC. Two good-sized bedrooms, both with built-in wardrobes, have excellent natural light. With the bonus of designated off-street parking, this welcoming apartment features quality carpets and ceramic floor finishes. The location is superb - close to Clifton Hill Village and station, Queen's Parade, and Yarra Parklands.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 21 other 2 bedroom unit in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Alternative to a House...
This spacious low maintenance home is located at the rear of a beautifully maintained block with access gained via a charming garden walkway lined with Silver Birches and offering security intercom access. Built circa 1996 in an attractive clinker brick (not a tilt slab or rendered Besser Block!) this contemporary town residence offers approximately 13 squares of light filled living featuring 2 huge bedrooms with robes, formal lounge, central well equipped kitchen, powder room, informal living/dining, highly functional laundry (not a cupboard!), large bathroom with separate bath & shower and North facing rear courtyard with single car park accessed from Yarrabing Lane. Further features include gas ducted heating, reverse cycle A/C and near new carpets.
At a still affordable price range this contemporary, well constructed home is certainly worth your consideration given its superb location to a host of amenities including the enchanting Dight’s Falls and Yarra River parkland...
Insights: 4/146 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2011 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Clifton Hill
You can afford Clifton Hill! This bright and spacious Victorian home is solid as a rock and offers an excellent foundation for those who want to renovate, or otherwise just move in right now and simply refurbish at leisure. Proudly maintained accommodation comprises entry hall with two double bedrooms, two living areas with well appointed kitchen, bathroom and separate laundry. You will also love the location - right in the hub of Clifton Hill with shops, trams, trains and the verdant Darling Gardens all just a minute away. Held as a happy home by the same family for the past fifty years this opportunity to purchase is rare indeed!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
Classic Clifton Hill!
The endearing Edwardian charm of this elevated tuckpointed brick home c1910 will inspire savvy buyers to secure a superb slice of the inner-city that will certainly be cause for celebration! Located on the corner of Kent Street with rear ROW, this classic semi-detached home will put first-home buyers and investors in perfect proximity to the action of Brunswick and Smith Streets, Queens Parade cafes, Darling Gardens, transport and school. Front and rear courtyard gardens flank this delightful home with fretted hallway leading to two double bedrooms, large living room with Godin gas heater, modern dining area and kitchen with gas stove, bathroom with laundry area, open fireplace, high period ceilings and new carpets. Exciting scope to further improve!
Belinda Lindsay : 0409 853 769

Description:
Diamond in The Sky...
Located at the rear of an attractive and well maintained block, this beautifully presented renovated 2 bedroom apartment enjoys a spacious floor plan, security entrance and undercover car space on title. Ideal as a first property purchase for the devoted inner city dweller or an astute investment acquisition, this diamond is assured of excellent rental returns and future capital growth.
The apartment offers 2 double bedrooms with robes, large living room, new kitchen with quality appliances, updated bathroom with shower over bath - plus laundry facilities and separate toilet.
An ideal environment for those of us who enjoy Clifton Hill, with extensive parkland, diverse range of specialty shops, delightful eateries and a myriad of public transport options, all at a short distance from your front door...
Insights: 16/41 Fenwick Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2011 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
